title: Handle a Purchase Order Change Request
description: A procurement manager needs to change the quantity of an item on a purchase order that has already been sent to a supplier.

tasks.description: Identify the PO and check its status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the supplier has acknowledged the PO but has not yet shipped it.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to request the change in quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal change request to the supplier.

tasks.description: The supplier agrees to the change. Update the PO in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully modifies the PO with the new quantity.
